name: Zero Wars
overview: Zero Wars is a side-scrolling science fiction shooter. The game takes place inside a space station invaded by alien forms. As a space fighter pilot the player must destroy all the hostile aliens. The player uses gun sight to target enemies. After clearing corridor a container appears. Shooting container gives an extra object, such us: smart bomb, crystal, shield, rapid fire weapon. Missing container causes re-appearing aliens in this corridor. Achieving the next level requires collecting of three crystals. After each completed sector player receives a level password.
